name: Battle In Village
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

To move around the world use WASD or arrow keys. Player may enter an encounter scene while moving over a grass tile. In the encounter scene, player can choose from the list of abilities they have by clicking on them. If the player wins the battle, they are going to gain a new ability.

In the encounter scene, player can save the game whenever they want.

*****CHEATE*****

In the encounter scenes, there is a back button on the top left corner of the screen. If the player clicks on that button, it will randomly determine if the player has won or lost the battle and return to the game world.
